actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the establishment of the Ohio and Erie Canal National Historical Park in the State of Ohio.

summary.text: Authorizes the establishment of the Ohio and Erie Canal National Historical Park in the State of Ohio. Authorizes to be appropriated sums necessary to carry out the purpose of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the establishment of the Ohio and Erie Canal National Historical Park in the State of Ohio.
